title: SCOTUS Lets Texas Use GOP-Friendly Congressional Map as Legal Battle Continues
description: The map is engineered to give GOP control of 30 of the state’s 38 congressional districts ahead of the 2026 midterms.
content:
Honest, paywall-free news is rare. Please support our boldly independent journalism with a donation of any size.
